trans-unit.source: Provides <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> objects for each state of the sizing handle of a scroll bar.

Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.SizeBox> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for the sizing handle of a scroll bar.
Gets a visual style element that represents a sizing handle that is aligned to the left.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.SizeBox.LeftAlign%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a sizing handle that is aligned to the left.
Gets a visual style element that represents a sizing handle that is aligned to the right.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.SizeBox.RightAlign%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a sizing handle that is aligned to the right.
